meanings.definition: To be in an upright position on the feet.
meanings.sent1: The cat stands on the mat.
meanings.sent3: The toy stands on its head, trying to be different.
meanings.sent4: His determination stands like a mountain against all odds.
meanings.sent5: The image of the lone tree standing in the field stands out in my memory.

meanings.definition: To remain valid or in force.
meanings.sent2: The law stands as a symbol of justice.
meanings.sent3: The excuse he gave stands as the most creative one yet.
meanings.sent4: Her love for him stands the test of time.
meanings.sent5: The truth stands like a beacon in the darkness of lies.

meanings.definition: A structure on which things can be placed.
meanings.sent1: The book stands on the wooden stand.
meanings.sent2: The cake stands were beautifully decorated.
meanings.sent3: The stand for the phone looks like a tiny throne.
meanings.sent4: The stand for the microphone is like a stage for sound.
meanings.sent5: The plant stand holds the pots in a neat row.
